name: Complete Electrician Simulator
description:
Complete Electrician Simulator Bundle includes:

- Electrician Simulator
- Electrician Simulator - Smart Devices

Electrician Simulator and Smart Devices DLC - Play the role of an electrician and learn the basics of electricity. Just like in real life, fix broken stuff, assemble sockets, repair gamepads, remote controls, speakers, plugs, chandeliers, change light bulbs, and lay wires. Be sure to check everything twice, there is no room for mistakes!
